verification.payload:
tree fb9faa2d058562735bee5b801b55ef3f2da0d5e6
parent 1e8f88e071019907785b260477bd359bef6f9a8f
author Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1538515952 +0300
committer Hennadii Stepanov <32963518+hebasto@users.noreply.github.com> 1542980416 +0200

Correct misleading "overridden options" label

Command-line options override values set in the configuration file and
configuration file options override values set in the GUI.

events.message:
Correct misleading "overridden options" label

Command-line options override values set in the configuration file and
configuration file options override values set in the GUI.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -714,7 +714,7 @@
         <item>
          <widget class="QLabel" name="overriddenByCommandLineInfoLabel">
           <property name="text">
-           <string>Active command-line options that override above options:</string>
+           <string>GUI options overridden by the command line or in the configuration file:</string>
comments.body: I think the first part is confusing, these are not only *GUI* options, but anything that can be configured in the options dialog.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -714,7 +714,7 @@
         <item>
          <widget class="QLabel" name="overriddenByCommandLineInfoLabel">
           <property name="text">
-           <string>Active command-line options that override above options:</string>
+           <string>GUI options overridden by the command line or in the configuration file:</string>
comments.body:
Could it be:
"_Options set in this dialog and overridden by the command line or in the configuration file:_" ?
